description:
Playtime roles are based on how how many hours you have spent in the Ark servers.
The default payday amount is 20 VC.

footer.text: Type '.vc' every 12 hours claim your payday rewards!

fields.name: 8 Hours
fields.value:
`Role:   `@Beach Bob <:stonehatchet:938291849888690239>
`Payday: `60 VC
`Perks:  `Send attachments, use 3rd party emojis

fields.name: 48 Hours
fields.value:
`Role:   `@Avid Arker <:pike:938291850366844998>
`Payday: `80 VC
`Perks:  `Gain the ability to change your nickname

fields.name: 200 Hours
fields.value:
`Role:   `@Seasoned <:longneck:938291850077417553>
`Payday: `100 VC
`Perks:  `Make community suggestions using the '.suggest' command

fields.name: 360 Hours
fields.value:
`Role:   `@Savage <:club:938291850337480764>
`Payday: `120 VC
`Perks:  `Access the basic role color panel

fields.name: 720 Hours
fields.value:
`Role:   `@Veteran <:fabbysnipe:938291850291322930>
`Payday: `200 VC
`Perks:  `Access the advanced role color panel
